name: Accordion Plugin by Themes Awesome
author: Themes Awesome

sections.description:
Accordion Awesome – WordPress Accordion Plugin

Accordion Awesome is a WordPress accordion plugin that helps you create FAQs, feature lists, pictures, articles, and much more. With a little creativity, you can create a stunning accordion look, quickly and easily.
If you need a great look for an accordion and don’t have much time to learn to code. Accordion Awesome is perfect for you, the options provided allow you to easily customize the display according to your content and website.

Check Accordion Awesome Demos

Accordion Awesome Demo

Accordion Awesome Feature

Accordion Awesome Pro || Read Documentation || View Demo

Accordion Awesome Feature

  • 5+ Ready Accordion design templates
  • Unlimited Colors
  • Creates unlimited Accordions
  • Drag and drop Item order
  • Clone Accordion item
  • Work with any themes
  • Insert Accordion using shortcode
  • Insert Accordion using Gutenberg block
  • Insert Accordion using Elementor block
  • Media embed support
  • Mobile Friendly
  • Cross-browser tested

Get More Features On Pro

Accordion Awesome Pro

  • More Accordion Interface Styles
  • More Accordion Details Style
sections.faq:
Is there a time period for using Accordion Awesome?

No, you can use Accordion Awesome onwards.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! Accordion Awesome will Works With Any Theme

What if I update to Accordion Awesome to Pro?

Your existing content will work with Accordion Awesome PRO. So you won’t lose your contents.

How do I translate the plugin?

We recommended Loco Translate for translate.for details on how to use it you can read our online documentation.
